mapper.insert: insert into communities (commu_id, commu_no , commu_title, commu_content, commu_img, category1 , commu_view ) values (#{commu_id}, null , #{commu_title}, #{commu_content}, #{commu_img} , #{category1} , #{commu_view} )
mapper.update: update communities set commu_title = #{commu_title} , commu_content = #{commu_content} where commu_no = #{commu_no}
mapper.select: select*from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by commu_no desc) as c_no , commu_no,commu_title,commu_date,commu_id,commu_view from communities c) c2 where c2.c_no between ${start} and ${end}
